Code.Content: Get-SPUser -Web <url> -Limit ALL | Where-Object {$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | Measure-Object | select Count
Get-SPSite -Limit ALL | Get-SPWeb -Limit ALL | %{Get-SPUser -Web $_.Url -Limit ALL} | Where-Object {$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | Measure-Object | select Count
Get-SPSite -Limit ALL | Get-SPWeb -Limit ALL | %{Get-SPUser -Web $_.Url -Limit ALL} | Where-Object {$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | select -Unique loginname | Measure-Object | select Count
(Get-SPSite -Limit All | Get-SPWeb -Limit All | select -ExpandProperty SiteUsers | ?{$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | select -Unique LoginName).count
(Get-SPSite -Limit All | select -ExpandProperty AllWebs | select -ExpandProperty AllUsers | ?{$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | select -Unique LoginName).count
Get-SPUser -Web <url> -Limit ALL | Where-Object {$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | Measure-Object | select Count
Get-SPSite -Limit ALL | Get-SPWeb -Limit ALL | %{Get-SPUser -Web $_.Url -Limit ALL} | Where-Object {$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | Measure-Object | select Count
Get-SPSite -Limit ALL | Get-SPWeb -Limit ALL | %{Get-SPUser -Web $_.Url -Limit ALL} | Where-Object {$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | select -Unique loginname | Measure-Object | select Count
(Get-SPSite -Limit All | Get-SPWeb -Limit All | select -ExpandProperty SiteUsers | ?{$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | select -Unique LoginName).count
(Get-SPSite -Limit All | select -ExpandProperty AllWebs | select -ExpandProperty AllUsers | ?{$_.IsDomainGroup -ne $true} | select -Unique LoginName).count
